2 #include "EventAnalyser.h"
3 #include "leica_scanstation_utils/LeicaUtils.h"
4 
5 // Global publisher
6 ros::Publisher g_pub, g_img_pub;
7 ros::ServiceClient g_client;
8 
9 int ScannerEventHandler(LeicaEventPtr Eventer)
10 {
11  // Publish on topic /eventer_info
12  leica_scanstation_msgs::EventerInfo event_msg;
13  EventAnalyser::assemblePublishMsg(&event_msg, Eventer);
14  LeicaNode::publishEventerInfo(g_pub, event_msg);
15 
16  // Analyse event result
17  if (EventAnalyser::isError(Eventer)) ROS_ERROR("ERROR!!");
18  else
19  {
20  std::string print_info = EventAnalyser::getStringResult(Eventer);
21  if (print_info != "") ROS_INFO("%s",print_info.c_str());
22 
23  // check for new image
24  if(EventAnalyser::_is_new_image)
25  {
26  // Publish on topic /image
27  sensor_msgs::Image image_msg;
28  LeicaNode::getImageMsg(&image_msg);
29  LeicaNode::publishVideoImage(g_img_pub,image_msg);
30  EventAnalyser::_is_new_image = false;
31  }
32 
33  // check for scan finished
34  if(EventAnalyser::_is_scan_finished)
35  {
36  // convert file scanned
37  std::string scan_file = LeicaNode::_last_file_name;
38  ROS_INFO("Converting file: %s",scan_file.c_str());
39  LeicaNode::bin2ptx(scan_file);
40  LeicaUtils::ptx2pcd(scan_file);
41  ROS_INFO("Saved scan pointcloud on: %s", LeicaUtils::getFilePath(scan_file,".pcd").c_str());
42  LeicaNode::publishScanPointcloudFile(g_client, scan_file);
43  EventAnalyser::_is_scan_finished = false;
44  }
45  }
46 
47  return 0;
48 }
49 
50 int main(int argc, char **argv)
51 {
52  ros::init(argc, argv, "leica");
53  ros::NodeHandle nh;
54  ROS_INFO("MAIN");
55 
56  // Tell Leica Node where should store scans and pointclouds
57  // The param /pointcloud_folder is set by a node on LeicaUtils.
58  // Run it using: rosrun leica_scanstation_utils main
59  std::string pc_path;
60  if (nh.getParam("/pointcloud_folder",pc_path))
61  {
62  ROS_INFO("Pointclouds path: %s", pc_path.c_str());
63  }
64  else
65  {
66  pc_path = LeicaUtils::getDefaultPointcloudPath();
67  ROS_INFO("Default pointclouds path: %s", pc_path.c_str());
68  }
69  LeicaUtils::setPointCloudPath(pc_path);
70 
71  LeicaNode leica_node = LeicaNode();
72 
73  // Get Leica Node publisher in a global copy
74  g_pub = leica_node._pub;
75  g_img_pub = leica_node._img_pub;
76 
77  // Get Leica Node client in a global copy
78  g_client = leica_node._client;
79 
80  int serial_number = 1260916; // not needed
81  int nfound;
82 
83  // Scan the network to get scanners
84  leica_node.searchForScanner(&nfound);
85  ROS_INFO("found %d scanners",nfound);
86 
87  if (nfound > 0)
88  {
89  // Scanner responds to commands by sending user events
90  // We use the event handler to analyse this response
91  ROS_INFO("Setting event handler");
92  EventAnalyser::setEventHandler(ScannerEventHandler);
93 
94  // Connect to scanner
95  ROS_INFO("Connecting");
96  leica_node.connectToScanner();
97 
98  // When connected, scanner start publishing video images
99  ROS_INFO("Starting video");
100  leica_node.startVideo();
101  }
102 
103  // Start ros services to control scanner
104  leica_node.openServices();
105 
106  ros::spin();
107 
108  return 0;
109 }
